extendedInfo.description: If you are Marilyn Manson's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Marilyn Manson's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Marilyn Manson's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Marilyn Manson's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)--------------------------------Main Features --------------------------------- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics--------------------------------List of albums --------------------------------- Portrait of an American Family- Smells Like Children- Antichrist Superstar- Mechanical Animals- Holy Wood (In the Shadow of the Valley of Death)- The Golden Age of Grotesque- Eat Me, Drink Me- The High End of Low- Born Villain--------------------------------List of lyrics --------------------------------- (s)AINT- 15- 1996- A Place In The Dirt- Abuse, Part 1 (There Is Pain Involved)- Abuse, Part 2 (Confessions)- Brown Bag- Burning Flag- Cake And Sodomy- Children Of Cain- Coma Black- Coma White- Count To Six And Die (The Vacuum Of Infinite Space Encompassing)- Cruci-Fiction In Space- Cryptorchid- Cyclops- reviews.title: Get all the lyrics and the release dates to the album\'s.
reviews.comment: Pretty cool if your a big fan
